doc.name: Torus3D
doc.description: This actor contains the geometry and appearance specifications for a GR torus. The output port is used to connect this actor to the Java3D scene graph. This actor will only have meaning in the GR domain. The parameter hullRadius determines the radius of torus ring. The parameter crossSectionRadius determines the radius of the torus cross-section. The parameter slices determines the number of polygonal slices used in the creating the torus.
doc.author: C. Fong
doc.property: The radius of the torus cross-section This parameter should contain a DoubleToken.
The radius of the torus outer hull This parameter should contain a DoubleToken.
The span of torus sweep angle This parameter should contain a DoubleToken.
The number of slices This parameter should contain a IntToken.
